title: Memory Fragment I
story: This piece explores the fragmented nature of memory, using layered textures and abstract forms to represent how we reconstruct our past experiences.

title: Pomergranate Lovers
story: An exploration of how technology shapes our perception of reality, blending traditional and digital mediums.

title: Untitled
story: One of David's earlier works, showcasing his mastery of traditional painting techniques.

title: What is there to say?
story: A three-dimensional exploration of space and form, representing the artist's venture into sculpture.

title: Abstract Composition
story: Bold colors and dynamic forms showcase David's mature style and confident brushwork.
